mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.ziliaoku_uuid_number as ziliaokuUuidNumber ,a.ziliaoku_name as ziliaokuName ,a.ziliaoku_file as ziliaokuFile ,a.ziliaoku_types as ziliaokuTypes ,a.ziliaoku_content as ziliaokuContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM ziliaoku a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.ziliaoku_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.ziliaokuUuidNumber},'%')
and a.ziliaoku_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.ziliaokuName},'%')
and a.ziliaoku_types = #{params.ziliaokuTypes}
and a.ziliaoku_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.ziliaokuContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
